Content:
Character has an icey aura of death.
When turn ends, remove Burning and Warm from allies, apply Chilled to enemies, and leach health from Frozen enemies.

If killed, character's soul will erupt, dealing damage within a 3m range.
Only targets enemies of the source of this status.

Character is full of dread.
If killed, may spread Fear or Madness to other characters with Dread.
Character has sacrificed the blood of a living being.

Character is an immortal, undead sorcerer.
Immunity to Bleeding & Suffocating
Chance to Resist Fear & Stunned
Lich Powers Unlocked

Character is immortal through the power of a Phylactery.
Phylactery Powers Unlocked
Character is slowly regenerating through the power of a Phylactery.

Character is being controlled through psychic domination.
Automatically cleansed if the source of domination is disabled or dies.
